question: What is the corpus of the Agriculture Infrastructure Fund that was launched by the Prime Minister?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi has formally launched the Rs 1 lakh crore worth Agriculture Infrastructure Fund.
He also handed over Rs 1000 crore to over 2000 farmer societies through video conferencing. The fund assists farmers, PACS, FPOs and agri-entrepreneurs to build community farming assets and post-harvest infrastructure. The Prime Minister also released Rs 17000 crore as the 6th instalment of PM KISAN.
